name: 呂志誠
objective:
本課程介紹可用於人工智慧與自動化技術之程式設計基礎觀念及應用。主要內容包括：1. 計算機系統簡介 2 . 資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯 3. 周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計 5. 作業系統 6. 檔案與資料庫 7. 人工智慧基礎概念
This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of programming design applicable to artificial intelligence and automation, including: 1.introduction to computer systems, 2.data representation, number systems, and logic 3.peripherals and storage, 4. programming languages and programming design 5. operating systems 6. files and database systems 7. fundamental concept of artificial intelligence.
